featured.text: Though he never went to college, he can talk about plants and trees like an expert.

other.text: Jack Olson is one of these experts.

Many scholars and experts from all over the world will be invited to attend this yearly ______ on drug control.

definition.zh_def: 專家，對某一領域具有深厚知識和技能的人。
definition.en_def: A person who has a comprehensive and authoritative knowledge of or skill in a particular area.
definition.example: She is an expert in marine biology.
